properties.comment: These are the preamble snippets needed for handling the string sort
properties.entry: (assert (forall ((s String)) (= (u2s (s2u s)) s))) (assert (forall ((x U)) (! (=> (= (typeof x) sort_string) (= (s2u (u2s x)) x)) :pattern ((typeof x))))) (assert (forall ((x U)) (! (=> (instanceof x sort_string) (= (typeof x ) sort_string)) :pattern ((instanceof x sort_string))))) (assert (forall ((s String)) (! (= (typeof (s2u s)) sort_string) :pattern ((typeof (s2u s))))))
(declare-fun u2s (U) String) (declare-fun s2u (String) U) (declare-const sort_string T)
